Feedback & Pending Comments: Everytime the user login, it shows to complete profile
Dev Notes: Likely a check in `App.tsx` or `AuthContext` that doesn't persist the 'profile completed' state correctly.

Feedback & Pending Comments: If user signup using Gmail service, then signed up using add email and used the same Gmail. It creates double account for the same email
Dev Notes: Enable 'Link identities' in Supabase Auth settings to merge providers with the same email.

Feedback & Pending Comments: User can create an Event even if no profile created, so better to remove the skip for now from the view where the user needs to fill the name, phone .. And its ok to skip for now in the next screen where the user will be filling business information unless it will be linked anywhere inside event creation
Dev Notes: Enforce validation in `EventCreationWizard.tsx` or the initial Profile Modal to prevent proceeding without base info.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Waitlist capacity cant be more than the max. attendees, and the field can take any value where it should be only numerical
Dev Notes: Add comparison validation: `waitlist <= maxAttendees`. Force input type='number'.

Feedback & Pending Comments: this field should be Numerical only
Dev Notes: Strict type checking on the input field.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Verification emails should be sent from Eventra not from Supabase Auth
Dev Notes: Requires SMTP configuration in Supabase or a custom Edge Function to send branded emails.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Adding the experience tags as a list so user can choose from
when user clicks to edit the speaker details, the name of the speaker is not shown and the field is empty, speaker's name that was there before the edit should show
Dev Notes: Fix the `useEffect` or state initialization in the Edit Modal to correctly load `selectedSpeaker` data.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Max Capacity should not be more than the max. attendees and the field takes any value where it should be only numerical
Dev Notes: Add validation in `EventScheduleTab` to check Session Capacity vs Event Capacity.

Feedback & Pending Comments: User can schedule two sessions or workshops in the same venue at the same date and time, where this should not happen. And an attention notification should popup to let the user know that this slot (time) is already scheduled
Dev Notes: Implement a conflict detection algorithm in `useSessions.ts` checking (Venue + Time Range).

Feedback & Pending Comments: Payment gateway is missing; paid tickets currently register users for free without charging
Dev Notes: Integrate Stripe Elements or PayPal SDK in `EventRegistrationFlow.tsx`. Update DB status upon webhook confirmation.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Freight and Load calculators are not returning results because the API base URL is unconfigured
Dev Notes: Verify the endpoint in `.env` (`VITE_LOGISTICS_API_BASE`). Ensure payload matches external vendor schema.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Row Level Security (RLS) in Supabase is too open; users can potentially see or edit data they don't own
Dev Notes: Harden Supabase policies specifically for `event_attendees` and `b2b_meetings`. Add `auth.uid() = owner_id` checks.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Global reporting and cross-event analytics are currently placeholders or mock data
Dev Notes: Build an Admin-only view that aggregates `event_tickets` and `registrations` tables across all published events.

Feedback & Pending Comments: The website preview in the Design Studio is only desktop-optimized; users can't see how the event page looks on mobile
Dev Notes: Implement a 'Mobile/Desktop' toggle in `PreviewPanel.tsx` that adjusts the iframe/container width.

Feedback & Pending Comments: Meeting notifications are sent but there is no 'Accept/Decline' flow for recipients yet
Dev Notes: Update `BookMeetingModal` and `UserB2BCenter` to handle status transitions (Pending -> Confirmed/Cancelled).
